com.konakart.appif

Interface StockReservationOptionsIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockReservationOptions

    public interface StockReservationOptionsIf
    The BookableProductOptions is used to define the behaviour of certain Bookable Product APIs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCatalogId()
      The id of the catalog which contains dynamic product information such as the price and quantity
      int getMaxReservationsPerCustomer()
      When set to a value greater than -1 (default) it limits the quantity of any one product that a customer can reserve.

      The number of seconds a product is reserved for.

      When true all available products are reserved even if the desired quantity isn't available.
      boolean isCalcQuantityForBundles()
      When set to true the quantity available for a product is calculated by reading the quantities of the products within the bundle.

      If true we attempt to fetch the prices from the external table

    • Method Detail

      • isAllowPartialReservation

        boolean isAllowPartialReservation()
        When true all available products are reserved even if the desired quantity isn't available. e.g. The customer attempts to order a quantity of 3 products but only 2 are available, then these 2 are reserved when allowPartialReservation is set to true. The default is false.
        Returns:
        the allowPartialReservation

      • setAllowPartialReservation

        void setAllowPartialReservation(boolean allowPartialReservation)
        When true all available products are reserved even if the desired quantity isn't available. e.g. The customer attempts to order a quantity of 3 products but only 2 are available, then these 2 are reserved when allowPartialReservation is set to true. The default is false.
        Parameters:
        allowPartialReservation - the allowPartialReservation to set

      • getMaxReservationsPerCustomer

        int getMaxReservationsPerCustomer()
        When set to a value greater than -1 (default) it limits the quantity of any one product that a customer can reserve.
        Returns:
        the maxReservationsPerCustomer

      • setMaxReservationsPerCustomer

        void setMaxReservationsPerCustomer(int maxReservationsPerCustomer)
        When set to a value greater than -1 (default) it limits the quantity of any one product that a customer can reserve.
        Parameters:
        maxReservationsPerCustomer - the maxReservationsPerCustomer to set

      • isCalcQuantityForBundles

        boolean isCalcQuantityForBundles()
        When set to true the quantity available for a product is calculated by reading the quantities of the products within the bundle.
        Returns:
        the calcQuantityForBundles

      • setCalcQuantityForBundles

        When set to true the quantity available for a product is calculated by reading the quantities of the products within the bundle.
        Parameters:
        calcQuantityForBundles - the calcQuantityForBundles to set

      • getReservationTimeSecs

        int getReservationTimeSecs()
        The number of seconds a product is reserved for. If not set (value = -1), the value is taken from a configuration variable. Default value is -1;
        Returns:
        the reservationTimeSecs

      • setReservationTimeSecs

        void setReservationTimeSecs(int reservationTimeSecs)
        The number of seconds a product is reserved for. If not set (value = -1), the value is taken from a configuration variable. Default value is -1;
        Parameters:
        reservationTimeSecs - the reservationTimeSecs to set
